# Input box

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description     | Type     | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `label`  | `label`   | label for input | `string` | ``      |

## Usage

```html
<<input-box label="First Name">
  <input type="text" />
</input-box>
```
